c74object.name: spat5.viewer.embedded
c74object.digest: Sources and speakers visualization and manipulation
c74object.description:
spat5.viewer is a 2D graphical representation of the spatial sound scene.
spat5.viewer allows you to manipulate the sound sources or the speakers positions.

attribute.name: embed
attribute.description: The embed attribute allows to store the state of the object within the patcher. The complete state of the object is stored whenever the patcher is saved to disk. Upon loading the patcher or copying the object box, the state is restored.

attribute.name: initwith
attribute.description:
The initwith attribute can be used to specify the initial state of the object. You should provide a list of comma-separated OSC commands. The list of messages should be quoted (with double quote character "). This is similar to sending the list of commands via loadbang or loadmess.
Have a look at the spat5.tuto-osc-3.maxpat example for further details.
Note that the initwith attribute cannot be set via message, attrui or inspector; it must be typed directly within the object box.

attribute.name: parameter_enable
attribute.description: The parameter_enable attribute is used for compatibility with Max snapshots. It can also be used to store the initial state of the object (see 'Initial Enable' in the Max inspector).

method.name: /source/number
method.description: set the number of sources.

method.name: /source/[index]/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/editable
method.description: set the editability of the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/select
method.description: select the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/mute
method.description: mute the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/color
method.description: set the color of the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/color/alpha
method.description: change alpha for the color of the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/color/alpha/add
method.description: increase/decrease alpha for the color of the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/proportion
method.description: set the proportion the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/proportion/add
method.description: increase/decrease the proportion the i-th source by a certain amount.

method.name: /source/[index]/constraint/circular
method.description: set the circular constraints for the i-th source.
method.digest: set the circular constraints for the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/label
method.description: set the label for the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/label/visible
method.description: set the visibility for the label for the i-th source.
method.digest: set the visibility for the label for the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/label/color
method.description: set the color for the label for the i-th source.
method.digest: set the color for the label for the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/label/justification
method.description: set the text justification for the label for the i-th source.
method.digest: set the text justification for the label for the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/vumeter/visible
method.description: set the visibility for the vumeter for the i-th source.
method.digest: set the visibility for the vumeter for the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/level
method.description: set the vumeter level (in dB) for the i-th source.
method.digest: set the vumeter level (in dB) for the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/xyz
method.description: set the position of the i-th source using cartesian coordinates.

method.name: /source/[index]/aed
method.description: set the position of the i-th source using navigation coordinates (azimuth/elevation/distance).

method.name: /source/[index]/xy
method.description: set the xy-coordinate of the i-th source, and use default z (=0).

method.name: /source/[index]/xy_
method.description: set the x and y-coordinate of the i-th source, and keep z unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/x
method.description: set the x-coordinate of the i-th source, and keep y and z unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/y
method.description: set the y-coordinate of the i-th source, and keep x and z unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/z
method.description: set the z-coordinate of the i-th source, and keep x and y unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/az
method.description: set the azimuth of the i-th source, using default distance (=1) and elevation (=0).

method.name: /source/[index]/ade
method.description: set the position of the i-th source using navigation coordinates (azimuth/distance/elevation).

method.name: /source/[index]/ae
method.description: set the azimuth/elevation of the i-th source, using default distance (=1).

method.name: /source/[index]/ad
method.description: set the azimuth/distance of the i-th source, using default elevation (=0).

method.name: /source/[index]/azim
method.description: set the azimuth of the i-th source. Elevation and distance remain unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/elev
method.description: set the elevation of the i-th source. Azimuth and distance remain unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/dist
method.description: set the distance of the i-th source. Azimuth and elevation remain unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/azimelev
method.description: set the azimuth and elevation of the i-th source. Distance remains unchanged.

method.name: /source/[index]/azimdist
method.description: set the azimuth and distance of the i-th source. Elevation remains unchanged.

method.name: /sources/aed
method.description: set the list of source coordinates (with aed format).

method.name: /sources/xyz
method.description: set the list of source coordinates (with xyz format).

method.name: /sources/ade
method.description: set the list of source coordinates (with ade format).

method.name: /sources/xy
method.description: set the list of source coordinates (with xy format).

method.name: /sources/ae
method.description: set the list of source coordinates (with ae format).

method.name: /source/[index]/aperture
method.description: set the aperture of the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/aperture/visible
method.description: set the visibility for the aperture of the i-th source.
method.digest: set the visibility for the aperture of the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/aperture/color
method.description: set the color for the aperture of the i-th source.
method.digest: set the color for the aperture of the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/yaw/mode
method.description: set the yaw mode of the i-th source.
method.digest: set the yaw mode of the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/yaw
method.description: set the yaw angle (in deg) of the i-th source, using Euler zyx convention.

method.name: /source/[index]/pitch
method.description: set the pitch angle (in deg) of the i-th source, using Euler zyx convention.

method.name: /source/[index]/roll
method.description: set the roll angle (in deg) of the i-th source, using Euler zyx convention.

method.name: /source/[index]/orientation
method.description: set the orientation quaternion (xyzw) of the i-th source.

method.name: /source/[index]/history/visible
method.description: set the visibility for the history of the i-th source.
method.digest: set the visibility for the history of the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/history/color
method.description: set the color for the history of the i-th source.
method.digest: set the color for the history of the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/history/thickness
method.description: set the line thickness for the history of the i-th source.
method.digest: set the line thickness for the history of the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/history/size
method.description: set the (past) size for the history of the i-th source.
method.digest: set the (past) size for the history of the i-th source

method.description: clear the history of the i-th source.
method.digest: clear the history of the i-th source

method.name: /source/[index]/tofront
method.description: bring the i-th source to the front of its siblings.
method.digest: bring the i-th source to the front of its siblings

method.name: /source/[index]/toback
method.description: bring the i-th source to the back of its siblings.
method.digest: bring the i-th source to the back of its siblings

method.description: bring the i-th source to the front or back of its siblings.
method.digest: bring the i-th source to the front or back of its siblings

method.description: set the image file (svg, jpg, png, etc.) to use for the i-th source.

method.description: use the default image for the i-th source.

method.description: set the vumeter levels (in dB) for all sources.

method.name: /post/version
method.description: print the version in the Max Console.

method.name: /post/version
method.description: print detailed version in the Max Console.

method.name: /post/doc
method.description: print the help documentation in the Max Console.

method.name: /post/state
method.description: print the OSC status in the Max Console.

method.name: /preset/load
method.description: load a preset from file. Supported file extensions : '.txt' for human-readable OSC text file, '.osc' for binary encoded OSC file, '.coll' for human-readable Max coll file (compatible with the coll object). '.txt' is the default file format. You can specify the fullpath of the file, or only its filename if the file is inside Max search path.

method.name: /preset/load
method.description: open a user dialog to load a preset file. Supported file extensions : '.txt' for human-readable OSC text file, '.osc' for binary encoded OSC file, '.coll' for human-readable Max coll file (compatible with the coll object). '.txt' is the default file format.

method.name: /preset/export
method.description: export a preset to file. Supported file extensions : '.txt' for human-readable OSC text file, '.osc' for binary encoded OSC file, '.coll' for human-readable Max coll file (compatible with the coll object). '.txt' is the default file format. If the file extension is not provided, '.txt' will be used by default. If the destination folder is not provided, the file will be saved in your home folder (/Users/yourlogin).

method.name: /preset/export
method.description: open a user dialog to export a preset to file. Supported file extensions : '.txt' for human-readable OSC text file, '.osc' for binary encoded OSC file, '.coll' for human-readable Max coll file (compatible with the coll object). '.txt' is the default file format.

method.name: /status
method.description: open the status window and bring it to front.

method.name: /status/open
method.description: open the status window and bring it to front.

method.name: /status/close
method.description: close the status window.

method.name: /status/openorclose
method.description: open the status window if it was closed; close it if it was opened.

method.name: /status/font/size
method.description: set the font size of the status window.

method.name: /status/floating
method.description: make the status window 'floating' (i.e. always on top of other windows).

method.name: /help
method.description: open the help window and bring it to front.

method.name: /help/open
method.description: open the help window and bring it to front.

method.name: /help/close
method.description: close the help window.

method.name: /help/openorclose
method.description: open the help window if it was closed; close it if it was opened.

method.name: /help/font/size
method.description: set the font size of the help window.

method.name: /help/floating
method.description: make the help window 'floating' (i.e. always on top of other windows).

method.name: /snapshot
method.description: open the snapshot window and bring it to front.

method.name: /snapshot/open
method.description: open the snapshot window and bring it to front.

method.name: /snapshot/close
method.description: close the snapshot window.

method.name: /snapshot/openorclose
method.description: open the snapshot window if it was closed; close it if it was opened.

method.name: /snapshot/font/size
method.description: set the font size of the snapshot window.

method.name: /snapshot/floating
method.description: make the snapshot window 'floating' (i.e. always on top of other windows).

method.name: /status/copytoclipboard
method.description: copy the status to (the OS) clipboard.

method.name: /status/copytoclipboard
method.description: copy the status to (the OS) clipboard, and specify the end-of-line character (e.g. ',').

method.name: /dump
method.description: dump the complete state of the object over the rightmost outlet (a.k.a. dump outlet).

method.name: /dump
method.description: dump a subset of the state of the object over the rightmost outlet. See spat5.tuto-dump-1.maxpat for usage examples.

method.name: /snapshot/deleteall
method.description: delete all the snapshots currently in memory.

method.name: /snapshot/add
method.description: create a new snapshot with the current state.

method.name: /snapshot/add
method.description: create a new snapshot with the current state, and set its name.

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/store
method.description: store the current state in the i-th snapshot (in memory).

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/recall
method.description: recall the current state from the i-th snapshot.

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/jump
method.description: immediately recall the current state from the i-th snapshot (ignoring recall time).

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/name
method.description: set the name of the i-th snapshot.

method.name: /snapshot/interpolate
method.description: interpolate between the i-th and j-th snapshots.

method.name: /snapshot/interpolate
method.description: interpolate between two snapshots, given their names.

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/delete
method.description: delete the i-th snapshot.

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/copytoclipboard
method.description: copy the i-th snapshot to (the OS) clipboard.

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/copytoclipboard
method.description: copy the i-th snapshot to (the OS) clipboard, and specify the end-of-line character (e.g. ',').

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/export
method.description: export the i-th snapshot to file.

method.name: /snapshot/[index]/export/content
method.description: export the content of the i-th snapshot to file.

method.name: /snapshot/export
method.description: export all snapshots to file.

method.name: /snapshot/import
method.description: import all snapshots from file.

method.name: /snapshot/recall/next
method.description: recall the next snapshot.

method.name: /snapshot/recall/previous
method.description: recall the previous snapshot.

method.name: /snapshot/jump/next
method.description: immediately recall the next snapshot (ignoring recall time).

method.name: /snapshot/jump/previous
method.description: immediately recall the previous snapshot (ignoring recall time).

method.name: /snapshot/recall
method.description: recall the i-th snapshot.

method.name: /snapshot/jump
method.description: immediately recall the i-th snapshot (ignoring recall time).

method.name: /snapshot/recall/bytitle
method.description: recall a snapshot by title/name.

method.name: /snapshot/jump/bytitle
method.description: immediately recall a snapshot by title/name (ignoring recall time).

method.name: /snapshot/lock
method.description: lock edition of the snapshots.

method.name: /snapshot/renumber
method.description: renumber the snapshots (their OSC pattern) based on their position.

method.name: /snapshot/sort
method.description: sort the snapshots alphabetically (based on their titles).

method.name: /backgroundimage/file
method.description: set the background image (png, jpg, etc.).
method.digest: set the background image (png, jpg, etc.)

method.name: /backgroundimage/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the background image.
method.digest: set the visibility of the background image

method.name: /backgroundimage/opacity
method.description: set the opacity of the background image.
method.digest: set the opacity of the background image

method.name: /backgroundimage/scale
method.description: set the scale factor of the background image.
method.digest: set the scale factor of the background image

method.name: /backgroundimage/angle
method.description: set the rotation angle of the background image.
method.digest: set the rotation angle of the background image

method.name: /backgroundimage/offset/x
method.description: set the x translation offset of the background image.
method.digest: set the x translation offset of the background image

method.name: /backgroundimage/offset/y
method.description: set the y translation offset of the background image.
method.digest: set the y translation offset of the background image

method.name: /backgroundimage/offset/xy
method.description: set the x/y translation offset of the background image.
method.digest: set the x/y translation offset of the background image

method.name: /backgroundimage/quality
method.description: set the resampling quality of the background image (low, medium, high).
method.digest: set the resampling quality of the background image (low, medium, high)

method.name: /display/zoom
method.description: set the display zoom factor (%).

method.name: /display/offset/x
method.description: set the display x translation offset (in pixels).
method.digest: set the display x translation offset (in pixels)

method.name: /display/offset/y
method.description: set the display y translation offset (in pixels).
method.digest: set the display y translation offset (in pixels)

method.name: /display/offset/z
method.description: set the display z translation offset (in pixels).
method.digest: set the display z translation offset (in pixels)

method.name: /display/offset/xy
method.description: set the display x/y translation offsets (in pixels).
method.digest: set the display x/y translation offsets (in pixels)

method.name: /display/offset/xyz
method.description: set the display x/y/z translation offsets (in pixels).
method.digest: set the display x/y/z translation offsets (in pixels)

method.name: /display/zoom/lock
method.description: enable/disable zooming with the mouse wheel.
method.digest: enable/disable zooming with the mouse wheel

method.name: /axis/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the axis.
method.digest: set the visibility of the axis

method.name: /axis/color
method.description: set the axis color.

method.name: /axis/label/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the axis label.
method.digest: set the visibility of the axis label

method.name: /axis/origin/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the axis origin.
method.digest: set the visibility of the axis origin

method.name: /axis/thickness
method.description: set line thickness.

method.name: /grid/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the grid.
method.digest: set the visibility of the grid

method.name: /grid/mode
method.description:
set the grid mode.
Possible values: none, circular, cartesian.
method.digest: set the grid mode. Possible values: none, circular, cartesian

method.name: /grid/spacing
method.description: set the spacing between grid lines (in meters).
method.digest: set the spacing between grid lines (in meters)

method.name: /grid/line/number
method.description: set the number of grid lines.
method.digest: set the number of grid lines

method.name: /grid/angulardivisions/number
method.description: set the number of angular divisions.
method.digest: set the number of angular divisions

method.name: /grid/angulardivisions/visible
method.description: set the visibility of angular divisions.
method.digest: set the visibility of angular divisions

method.name: /grid/dashed
method.description: set the line style.

method.name: /grid/color
method.description: set the line color.

method.name: /grid/thickness
method.description: set line thickness.

method.name: /grid/unitcircle/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the unit circle.
method.digest: set the visibility of the unit circle

method.name: /grid/unitcircle/color
method.description: set the color of the unit circle.
method.digest: set the color of the unit circle

method.name: /grid/unitcircle/radius
method.description: set the radius of the unit circle.
method.digest: set the radius of the unit circle

method.name: /legend/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the legend.
method.digest: set the visibility of the legend

method.name: /legend/color
method.description: set the legend color.

method.name: /legend/unit
method.description: set distance unit.

method.name: /emphasis/source
method.description: emphasize sources when mouse in proximity.
method.digest: emphasize sources when mouse in proximity

method.name: /emphasis/stereo
method.description: emphasize stereos when mouse in proximity.
method.digest: emphasize stereos when mouse in proximity

method.name: /emphasis/speaker
method.description: emphasize speakers when mouse in proximity.
method.digest: emphasize speakers when mouse in proximity

method.name: /emphasis/microphone
method.description: emphasize microphones when mouse in proximity.
method.digest: emphasize microphones when mouse in proximity

method.name: /ruler/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the ruler.
method.digest: set the visibility of the ruler

method.name: /ruler/color
method.description: set the ruler color.

method.name: /ruler/unit
method.description: set the unit of the ruler.
method.digest: set the unit of the ruler

method.name: /area/number
method.description: set the number of areas.

method.name: /area/[index]/vertex/number
method.description: set the number of vertex for the i-th area.
method.digest: set the number of vertex for the i-th area

method.name: /area/[index]/vertex/[index]/xy
method.description: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th area.
method.digest: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th area

method.name: /area/[index]/vertex/[index]/xyz
method.description: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th area.
method.digest: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th area

method.name: /area/[index]/vertex/[index]/aed
method.description: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th area.
method.digest: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th area

method.name: /area/[index]/visible
method.description: set visibility for the i-th area.
method.digest: set visibility for the i-th area

method.name: /area/[index]/color
method.description: set color for the i-th area.
method.digest: set color for the i-th area

method.name: /area/[index]/name
method.description: set name for the i-th area.
method.digest: set name for the i-th area

method.name: /path/number
method.description: set the number of paths.

method.name: /path/[index]/vertex/number
method.description: set the number of vertex for the i-th path.
method.digest: set the number of vertex for the i-th path

method.name: /path/[index]/vertex/[index]/xy
method.description: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th path.
method.digest: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th path

method.name: /path/[index]/vertex/[index]/xyz
method.description: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th path.
method.digest: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th path

method.name: /path/[index]/vertex/[index]/aed
method.description: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th path.
method.digest: set position of the j-th vertex of the i-th path

method.name: /path/[index]/visible
method.description: set visibility for the i-th path.
method.digest: set visibility for the i-th path

method.name: /path/[index]/color
method.description: set color for the i-th path.
method.digest: set color for the i-th path

method.name: /speakerhull/color
method.description: set the hull color.

method.name: /speakerhull/visible
method.description: set the visibility of the hull.
method.digest: set the visibility of the hull

method.name: /speakerhull/fill/color
method.description: set the hull interior color.

method.name: /speakerhull/fill
method.description: fill the hull.

method.name: /layout
method.description:
set the window layout.
Possible values: single, leftright, topbottom, automatic.
method.digest: set the window layout. Possible values: single, leftright, topbottom, automatic
